channel.title: Abouts on John P. Neumann - Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on John P. Neumann - Developer

item.title: About
item.description: I love all things Linux and am an avid open source advocate. The project I’ve had the most activity on recently is the popular Prezto zsh framework. I’m always looking for additional projects to contribute to, though I try not to stretch myself too thin. I’ve written in mang languages over the course of my time, but have a penchant for Python and Golang. I really enjoy systems and have worked with Ansible for quite some time now and utilize it for everything (including provisioning my dev machines and Raspberry Pi’s).
